examples.text: for someone so young, Chris is extremely grounded

definitions: (of a pilot or an aircraft) prohibited or prevented from flying

examples.text: you don't taunt a grounded flier, especially after he's had a few beers

definitions: (of a child being punished) not allowed to participate in social or recreational activities

examples.text: the problem is, I've got more grounded friends than available friends

shortDefinitions: not allowed to participate in social or recreational activities
